description:
Arisa is a slave and a former princess of Kuvork Kingdom. She reincarnated from a previous life in Japan with her previous life`s memory still intact. Her violet hair and iris are considered a bad omen, which might be the reason she long remained unsold as a slave until http://anidb.net/ch91583 [Satou] bought her and her half-sister http://anidb.net/ch92289 [Lulu].
Source: Death March Wikia
name: Arisa
